By the way, about the CIG Symposium, I will be giving one of the tutorials =
there:

TUTORIALS (from Julian's announcement)
* Playing Machines: Machine =
Learning Applications in Computer Games
Ralf Herbrich & Joaquin Qui=F1onero=
 Candela, Microsoft Research Cambridge
* Practical Issues in Evolving Neura=
l Network Controllers for Video Game Agents
Kenneth O. Stanley, University =
of Central Florida

I look forward to meeting other members of this group i=
n Italy.

ken
